title: Black bean and wild rice salad
ingredients: ['1 red onion, finely chopped', '1 bunch fresh coriander leaves, chopped', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained and rinsed', '450g cooked wild rice', '60g dried cranberries', '120g roughly chopped cashews', '120ml freshly squeezed orange juice', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons tarragon vinegar', '1 1/2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
